transcript.transcriptmessage: ALICE: Hi, my name is Alice Miller and this is John Brown
JOHN: We're the owners of Miller Bakery.
ALICE: Today we'll be teaching you how to make our famous chocolate chip cookies!
JOHN: Remeber before we start that you must follow the instructions exactly, in order to have the best results.
